name: canshare-breast-clinical-behaviour-category
title: NZ cancer breast clinical behaviour category
description: The behaviour categories relevant to breast tumours by clincal examination.

filter.value: < 477441000210109 |Royal College of Radiologists breast imaging classification for clinical examination|

contains.display: Benign finding on clinical examination of breast
Highly suspicious of malignancy on clinical examination of breast

Suspicious of malignancy on clinical examination of breast
